item.title: Kristin add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "They were watching, out there past men's knowing, where stars are drowning and whales ferry their vast souls through the black and seamless sea." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "Your heart's desire is to be told some mystery. The mystery is that there is no mystery." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "There is no such joy in the tavern as upon the road thereto." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "He poured the tumbler full. Drink up, he said. The world goes on. We have dancing nightly and this night is no exception. The straight and the winding way are one and now that you are here what do the years count since last we two met together? Men's memories are uncertain and the past that was differs little from the past that was not." -- Cormac McCarthy
